SELECT hi.id, hi.name, hi.address, hi.images, hi.tag, hi.content, hi.point, hi.policy, hi.check_in AS checkIn, hi.create_date AS createDate, tu.LAST_LOGIN_TIME AS lastTime, tu.`STATUS` AS hotelStatus FROM hotel_info hi LEFT JOIN t_user tu ON ( tu.USER_ID = hi.user_id ) WHERE 1 = 1
AND hi.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{hotelInfo.name},'%')
AND hi.address LIKE CONCAT('%',#{hotelInfo.address},'%')
AND hi.tag LIKE CONCAT('%',#{hotelInfo.tag},'%')
